revision.text:
'''R. Doug Lewis''' has served as Executive Director of the [[Election Center]] since 1994.<ref name="eline">[http://www.electionline.org/Default.aspx?tabid=462 Doug Lewis], from [http://www.electionline.org electionline.org]</ref> The Election Center is a nonprofit also known as the National Association of Election Officials, whose purpose is "to promote, preserve, and improve democracy."<ref>[http://www.electioncenter.org/about.html About the Election Center], from the [[Election Center]]</ref>
==Current positions== * Executive Director of the [[Election Center]] * [[Election Assistance Commission]] Board of Advisors<ref>[[Election Assistance Commission]] [http://www.eac.gov/eac_boardadv.htm Board of Advisors]</ref> * [http://www.electionline.org electionline.org] Advisory Board<ref>[http://www.electionline.org/AboutUs/AdvisoryBoard/tabid/103/Default.aspx electionline.org Advisory Board]</ref> * Director of the Voting Systems Program for the [[National Association of State Election Directors]] (NASED) * Member of the national Voting Systems Board and the California Internet Voting Advisory Committee
==Testimony== * [http://www.eac.gov/docs/EAC%20Testimony%202006%20-%20Lewis.pdf Testimony] presented to the United States [[Election Assistance Commission]] Public Meeting, December 7, 2006 * [http://www.eac.gov/docs/June%203%20Overview%20-%20Doug%20Lewis.doc Statement] presented to the United States [[Election Assistance Commission]] Public Hearing, June 3, 2004 * [http://judiciary.senate.gov/testimony.cfm?id=909&wit_id=2566 Testimony] for U.S. Senate Hearings On Disasters and Special Elections Senate Judiciary Committee Subcommittee on Constitution, September 9, 2003 * [http://www.aapd-dc.org/dvpmain/paperballot/downloads/Lewis%20testimony%20CA%20Sec%20of%20State.pdf Testimony] before the California Secretary of State's Ad Hoc Committee on Voter Verified Paper Ballots * [http://www.senate.gov/~govt-aff/050901_Lewis.htm Testimony] for Senate Government Affairs Committee, May 9, 2001
==References== {{Reflist}}
